channel.title: Butler's Toxic Wine should be renamed
channel.description: The Butler's Toxic Wine ability sounds awkward, maybe something simpler like Poisoned Wine. Toxic has a connotation of being noticeable because of smell or whatever (toxic waste, for example), whereas poisoning someone's wine should be more subtle

item.title: Butler's Toxic Wine should be renamed
item.dc:creator: PandaPete
item.description:
I take it will be changed to black wine or whatever the new name is in fol as tol now.

Read full topic

item.description:
Lemme see…

Hyper bad baleful baneful corruptive dangerous deadly deleterious destructive detrimental, evil, fatal, hurtful, infective, lethal, malicious, malignant, mephitic, miasmatic, morbid, mortal, nocuous, noisome, noxious, peccant, pernicious, pestiferous, pestilential, septic, toxic, toxicant, toxiferous, venomous, vicious, viperous, virulent wine

item.title: Butler's Toxic Wine should be renamed
item.dc:creator: Chancellor
item.description:
Hello

This is my first forum post. I would like to say I agree with this suggestion. Toxic isn’t the right descriptive word to use in this scenario.

Thanks for reading.
